verses.text:
O \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*: \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; shew \w forth|strong="H1319"\w* his \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* from \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w Declare|strong="H5608"\w* his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, his \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* among all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* to be \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*: he \add is\add* to be \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* above all \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

For all the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \add are\add* \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w Honour|strong="H1935"\w* and \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w* \add are\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w* \add are\add* in his \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O ye \w kindreds|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w give|strong="H3051"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* and \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \add due unto\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*.\f + \fr 96.8 \ft due…: Heb. of his name\f*

O \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w beauty|strong="H1927"\w* of \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*: \w fear|strong="H2342"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 96.9 \ft in the…: or, in the glorious sanctuary\f*

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*: the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* also shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* that it shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*: he shall \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w righteously|strong="H4339"\w*.

Let the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, and let the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w*; let the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w roar|strong="H7481"\w*, and the \w fulness|strong="H4393"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 96.11 \ft the fulness…: or, all it containeth\f*

Let the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* be \w joyful|strong="H5937"\w*, and all that \add is\add* therein: then shall all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w*

\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, for he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: he shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* with \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with his \w truth|strong="H0530"\w*.
